text: The National Institute of Electronics (NIE) is a research institution coming under the Ministry of Science and Technology (Pakistan) of the Government of Pakistan of which Fawad Chaudhry is minister from 18 April 2019. ==Formation== The National Institute of Electronics was established in 1979 through an ordinance proclaimed by the President of Pakistan. ==Research and Development Labs== The institution has the following research and development departments: * Automation & Control Engineering Group * Center for Software Development & Training in Advance Databases * Center for Quality Testing & Certification of Electronics Projects * Communication Engineering Group * Integrated Circuit Design Center * Large Scale Electronic Display Group * PCB Design & Fabrication ==References== ==External links== * NIE official website * Ministry of Science and Technology Category:Pakistan federal departments and agencies Category:Science and technology in Pakistan Category:Research institutes in Pakistan Category:1979 establishments in Pakistan
title: National Institute of Electronics (Pakistan)
